title: ASSPEN
text: Butters' house, night, kitchen. Linda is serving drinks. The Marshes and the Broflovskis are at table. Sheila holds Ike on her lap

title: ASSPEN
text: Thanks for having us all over for dinner, Chris and Linda.

title: ASSPEN
text: Yes, it was fabulous.

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh, we're just really happy that your boys have become such good friends with our little Butters.

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah. We figure that if our boys are goona be great friends, we should all get to be friends, too.

title: ASSPEN
text: Freinds, by default.

title: ASSPEN
text: Well, our boys do seem to be spending a lot of time together lately. I think ever since their friend Kenny died they've been looking for someone to fill the void.

title: ASSPEN
text: Well, our son is a perfect void-filler. It's nice that he finally has your sons to be his best buddies!

title: ASSPEN
text: Butters' house, living room. The four boys sit on the sofa looking at television, except Butters is asleep at one end

title: ASSPEN
text: Look you guys, Butters is asleep.

title: ASSPEN
text: He's such a douchebag

title: ASSPEN
text: Hey! Have you guys ever seen this trick? When someone's sleeping, you can take a glass of warm water,  and you put their hand in it...

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah, and then what?

title: ASSPEN
text: And then, you pee on it!  heheh, heheheheheheheh.

title: ASSPEN
text: No, dude, you're supposed to put their hand in warm water and it makes them pee.

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh, really? ...Oh well, heh, heheheheh, heh

title: ASSPEN
text: Butters' house, kitchen. Conversation goes on

title: ASSPEN
text: And we were thinking, since they've all become such close friends, how great it would be for us to all go together to Aspen for a ski weekend.

title: ASSPEN
text: A-Aspen? Ohhh, we, we can't really afford that.

title: ASSPEN
text: No, you see, Linda and I found this ad where you can get two night free at a condo in Aspen if you attend a time-share presentation..

title: ASSPEN
text: They let you stay for free?

title: ASSPEN
text: Yes! And all we have to do is attend a thirty-minute meeting!

title: ASSPEN
text: Well that sounds like a good deal.

title: ASSPEN
text: Sounds good to me; let's go this weekend.

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh boy! Skiing in Aspen! I can't wait!

title: ASSPEN
text: Hey boys! We're all going to Aspen fior the weekend!

title: ASSPEN
text: All right!

title: ASSPEN
text: Wow, a ski trip with my new best buddies! Oh, I'm all sticky.

title: ASSPEN
text: The Rocky Mountains, day. Chris Stotch drives all three families and Cartman off to Aspen

title: ASSPEN
text: Here we are, everyone.

title: ASSPEN
text: Fade in, next morning. The adults sit around a coffee table while the kids sit at the dining table eating breakfast behnd them. The adults are getting dressed for the day

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh, this is gonna be so much fun; I haven't skied in years!

title: ASSPEN
text: Where are Butters and Eric?

title: ASSPEN
text: They're still asleep.

title: ASSPEN
text: Butters? Eric? Come on! We gotta get to the powder!

title: ASSPEN
text: Hello, folks, I'm Phil and this is Josh . We're with the Aspen Time-Share Company.

title: ASSPEN
text: Hello.

title: ASSPEN
text: You folks enjoying the condo?

title: ASSPEN
text: It's lovely. Thank you.

title: ASSPEN
text: The dining table

title: ASSPEN
text: You guys, you guys! You're not gonna believe this, this is sooo funny!

title: ASSPEN
text: What

title: ASSPEN
text: So last night, while Butters was asleep, I gave him a Hitler.

title: ASSPEN
text: What's a Hitler?

title: ASSPEN
text: You know, when somebody is sleeping and you put your finger up your butt and then, wipe it on their upper lip to give them a little Hitler mustache? You've never Hitlered anyone?

title: ASSPEN
text: No, I never have.

title: ASSPEN
text: Shh-shh, here he comes.

title: ASSPEN
text: Goooood mornin', fellas! All set to go skiin'?  A-huh, u-uh, uh what's so funny?

title: ASSPEN
text: Nothing, Butters. Right, guys??

title: ASSPEN
text: The front door

title: ASSPEN
text: Well, we can't wait to show you what Aspen Time-Share is offering investors. Shall we do our thirty-minute meeting?

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh, do we have to do it right now?

title: ASSPEN
text: Well, best to do it and get it out of the way.

title: ASSPEN
text: Okay.

title: ASSPEN
text: Boys, we have to go to this time-share presentation real quick, but you go meet your ski instructor on the bunny hill.

title: ASSPEN
text: Okay.

title: ASSPEN
text: We'll meet you boys on the slopes.

title: ASSPEN
text: Hey, do you guys smell that?

title: ASSPEN
text: Smell what?

title: ASSPEN
text: Ehh, it kind of smells stinky in this condo.

title: ASSPEN
text: I don't smell anythng. Do you guys?

title: ASSPEN
text: Music fades in. Exterior shots of the resort are shown .The bunny slope is shown. Lifts go up and down as kids practice skiing moves. The four boys and Ike are shown waiting for their instructor.

title: ASSPEN
text: Do you guys smell that? It smells bad out here, too. I'm starting to think this whole town smells like doodoo.

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah, well, that why they call is Asspen.

title: ASSPEN
text: All right, little dudes,  great to see you out here. My name is Thumper, and I'm gonna be your cool ski instructor.

title: ASSPEN
text: His name is Thumper?

title: ASSPEN
text: We're gonna take it slow, take it easy, make sure everybody has a goood time. 'Cause what is skiing about? Having a good...?  Tiime, that's right. Now, just a few safety things to keep in mind: First of all, look straight ahead when you ski. You look down, you're gonna fall, you're gonna have a bad time. Also, be aware of skiers around you. You run into another skier, your skis are gonna cross, gonna have a bad time.

title: ASSPEN
text: So where's the part where we have a good time?

title: ASSPEN
text: Hey, little dude, you got some crap right here.

title: ASSPEN
text: Wuh that's my face, sir.

title: ASSPEN
text: Alright, we're gonna do this without any poles until we know our two primary feet positions. To go slow, we wedge our skis together , in the shape of a slice... of pizza. Then to go faster, we put 'em parallel, like... French fries.  You see that?  Pizza,  French fries,  Pizza,  French fries.

title: ASSPEN
text: Ah hey, this is gonna be just like eatin' at Shakey's, huh fellas?

title: ASSPEN
text: Okay, let's have the little dude at the end try first! What's your name?

title: ASSPEN
text: Iiiiike!

title: ASSPEN
text: Okay, Mike, ski down to me!

title: ASSPEN
text: Go on, Ike.

title: ASSPEN
text: Pee-za, Fron fries. Pee-za, Fron fries. Fron friiiies.  Peeee-zaaa

title: ASSPEN
text: Okay, you see what he did? He French-fried when he should've piiza'd. You French-fry when you should pizza, you're gonna have a bad time.

title: ASSPEN
text: The meeting, meanwhile. Phil and Josh are presenting the time-share plan

title: ASSPEN
text: And so, we think we can convince you to buy one of our combos that's opening right here in Phase 4.

title: ASSPEN
text: That sounds like a GREAT investment opportunity!

title: ASSPEN
text: I I'm sorry, but none of us can really afford to own our own vacation condo.

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah, and to be honest, we're just doing this meeting because of the two nights free deal.

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh, I know, that's what everybody says - "Not me, I can't afford it." But what if I told you you could own one of our properties for only eight thousand dollars?

title: ASSPEN
text: Wow!

title: ASSPEN
text: For only eight thousand dollars we can buy a condo here?

title: ASSPEN
text: Well you see, "time-share" means you buy the condo with about twenty other people like yourselves  You  "share" the condo with other investors and pick the  "time" you want to stay.

title: ASSPEN
text: Share,  time.  Time share.

title: ASSPEN
text: So then it's not really ours.

title: ASSPEN
text: Sure it is, one twenty-fourth and a half yours! You see, time-share has made it possible for even working-class people like you to say, "I've got a little place in Aspen."

title: ASSPEN
text: Try it. Try saying it. "I've got a little place in Aspen."

title: ASSPEN
text: I've got a little place in Aspen.

title: ASSPEN
text: Rolls off the tongue, doesn't it? Say guys, how'd you like to tell that hot secretary "I've got a nice little place in Aspen"? Hahaha. Just kidding, wives.

title: ASSPEN
text: Listen uh, it's been thirty minutes. We'd like to go hit the slopes now?

title: ASSPEN
text: Woll uh, you still gotta come to the time-share luncheon. We did give you a free condo for the weekend.

title: ASSPEN
text: Well your ad said we only had to attend a thirty-minute meeting.

title: ASSPEN
text: R-right, but this isn't that meeting. The luncheon is that meeting.  Don't worry, you're gonna have a great free meal at the luncheon.

title: ASSPEN
text: Bunny slope, later.

title: ASSPEN
text: ...french fries... pizza... french fries...  come on, Cartman.

title: ASSPEN
text: Ugh, no more.

title: ASSPEN
text: Looks like you think you're a pretty good skier, huh, kid?

title: ASSPEN
text: Well I'm... catchin' on pretty fast, I guess.

title: ASSPEN
text: I've been skiing for twenty-two years. Think you could beat me?

title: ASSPEN
text: Uhh no.

title: ASSPEN
text: What's your name, hot shot?

title: ASSPEN
text: Stan. Marsh.

title: ASSPEN
text: Stan Marsh  Stan DARSH is more like it.

title: ASSPEN
text: Haaaa, Darsh!

title: ASSPEN
text: Alright, how about a race, then? You and me.

title: ASSPEN
text: Dude, I'm just learning.

title: ASSPEN
text: OooooOOOOooo!  Looks to me like you're not a "hot shot" after all.

title: ASSPEN
text: I never said I was.

title: ASSPEN
text: Oooooooo!

title: ASSPEN
text: Oooooooo!

title: ASSPEN
text: You may think you've got what it takes, but as long as I'm around, you'll always be number two!  See ya leter, Darsh!

title: ASSPEN
text: The meeting at Aspen Heaven, later. Phil and Josh are still extolling the time-share plan

title: ASSPEN
text: And THAT is why owning a piece of an Aspen condo is not only possible,...

title: ASSPEN
text: It's downright smart!

title: ASSPEN
text: Aha.

title: ASSPEN
text: Op, here it is! As promised, a fabulous free lunch!

title: ASSPEN
text: Wow, filet mignon and lobster!

title: ASSPEN
text: Not bad.

title: ASSPEN
text: It's nice to feel rich, isn't it.

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh, you know, this is really great.

title: ASSPEN
text: It sure it.

title: ASSPEN
text: What?

title: ASSPEN
text: Wait...

title: ASSPEN
text: You see? That's the great thing about time-share. You get a little taste of luxuries you can't afford.

title: ASSPEN
text: And then share it with the people who come tomorrow.

title: ASSPEN
text: All right, look, we've been here for over three hours

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah. Can we go now, please?

title: ASSPEN
text: Of course you can. Go hit those slopes! If you could just please show me the backs of your table place cards real quick?  Oh my God! You got the red sticker!

title: ASSPEN
text: They got the red sticker?

title: ASSPEN
text: They got the red sticker!

title: ASSPEN
text: What's the red sticker?

title: ASSPEN
text: Uh, well, well, that means if you come up to the condo sales office you'll receive one of three great prizes.

title: ASSPEN
text: No, nononono. We, we did your meeting and we did your lunch, we're finished, okay.

title: ASSPEN
text: Okay, okay, fine, I mean...  It would only take a second, but, I mean, you know, what did we do for you except, give you a free condo for the weekend. Huh. Seems like you coud just... could just come up... and see what prize you had...

title: ASSPEN
text: A-all right!

title: ASSPEN
text: The bunny slope, even later. Kyle and Stan are skiing down faster now, mastering the basic pizza-French fries technique

title: ASSPEN
text: ...pizza...French fries...Frnehc fries...pizza...

title: ASSPEN
text: ...French fries...pizza...pizza...pizza-French fries... I wonder where our parents are.

title: ASSPEN
text: Who cares? I'm having more fun on my own.

title: ASSPEN
text: well well well, if it isn't Stan Darsh!

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh no.

title: ASSPEN
text: Say Darsh, you don't mind if I take Heather out for some fondue tonight, do ya?

title: ASSPEN
text: Heather?

title: ASSPEN
text: Sorry, Stan, it's just that when it comes to skiing, Tad has all the right moves.

title: ASSPEN
text: I just might show her my moves tonight, if you know what I mean.

title: ASSPEN
text: You aren't mad, are you, Stan? I mean, a girl's gotta look out for her best interests.

title: ASSPEN
text: ...who are you people?!

title: ASSPEN
text: Still don't wanna race me? I told you he was chicken, Heather. Stan Marsh the Darsh!

title: ASSPEN
text: All right dude, if I race you will you leave me alone?

title: ASSPEN
text: Oooooooo!

title: ASSPEN
text: Allright, fine. You and me at the summit, now!

title: ASSPEN
text: Okay.

title: ASSPEN
text: Race! Race!

title: ASSPEN
text: Ski run, moments later. A view from the bottom shows a long run, and the resort's main buildings off to the right near the finish line

title: ASSPEN
text: Ladies and Gentlemen, Aspen Mountain presents another ex-TREME racing showdown. Seven-time World Aspen champion Tad Mikowski versus eight-year-old Stan Marsh!

title: ASSPEN
text: Hah! You're going down, little boy!

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah, prob'ly

title: ASSPEN
text: Do you think Stan has a chance?  Uh go Stan!

title: ASSPEN
text: Fries... fries...

title: ASSPEN
text: He's got it! Tad's gonna win it!

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah! Yeeaah! Yeah!! You lose, Darsh!! Yeah!

title: ASSPEN
text: U-u-uh, Stan, ya-you gave it your best shot, and that all Jesus asks of you.

title: ASSPEN
text: Dude, I'm just happy this whole stupid thing is all over with.

title: ASSPEN
text: No hard feelings, right Darsh??  Yeah!!

title: ASSPEN
text: Stan,  for what it's worth, I think you were really brave.

title: ASSPEN
text: Thanks. Who are you?

title: ASSPEN
text: Hey, all the cool teens are gonna be at the youth center tonight for a dance. I hope you'll come because you're just so... wehell, you're just so.. well, that's all.

title: ASSPEN
text: The valley, day. There are three long lines of people waiting to ski. The parents finally make it out of the meeting

title: ASSPEN
text: Finally, we get to go skiing!

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh my God, look how long the lift lines are.

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah, I guess these passes the time-share salesman gave us will come in handy.

title: ASSPEN
text: Can I help you?

title: ASSPEN
text: Yes, we have the special passes to use the exclusive lift from the time-share comapny?

title: ASSPEN
text: Ooooh, go right on ahead, folks.

title: ASSPEN
text: Thank you.

title: ASSPEN
text: Well, this certainly is nice.

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah, we may not have gotten to ski earlier, but with this lift we'll get more runs in than anybody.

title: ASSPEN
text: Have fun waiting in line, suckers! Woohoohoo!

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh, Chris.  Hey look, this lift goes right into a building.

title: ASSPEN
text: Aspen Heaven meeting room, again.

title: ASSPEN
text: Welcome back, folks

title: ASSPEN
text: We've got a special offer we can't wait to tell you about!

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh, God-damnit!

title: ASSPEN
text: Aspen Youth Center. Teens enter from all sides. The boys go in as well.

title: ASSPEN
text: Dude, it's been twelve hours. Where the hell are our parents?!

title: ASSPEN
text: Aspen Youth Center, inside. The boys find themselves on a dance floor listening to a live band

title: ASSPEN
text: I'm glad you guys came. Do you like our youth center?

title: ASSPEN
text: Seems fine.

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah, too bad we're getting shut down. That hot-shot skier Tad's father is gonna bulldoze the building

title: ASSPEN
text: Where are all us kids supposed to go?

title: ASSPEN
text: Don't care.

title: ASSPEN
text: What do you wanna do now?

title: ASSPEN
text: I dunno.

title: ASSPEN
text: Let's dance.

title: ASSPEN
text: Butters, I hate you with every inch of my body.

title: ASSPEN
text: Alright, Aspen, heh. As a special treat tonight we're proud to have the winner of today's race, Tad Mikowski. <>i>

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah!

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh God.

title: ASSPEN
text: Hey everyone.  I'd like to sing a little song, if I may.

title: ASSPEN
text: Ooooooooo.

title: ASSPEN
text: Gah, let's go you guys.

title: ASSPEN
text: This is a song I wrote about... Stan Marsh.

title: ASSPEN
text: Dude, what the hell is your problem?!

title: ASSPEN
text: OooOOOOOOoooooo!

title: ASSPEN
text: I raced you, You won.

title: ASSPEN
text: A rematch? Oh, Darsh. You're ven dumber than I thought.

title: ASSPEN
text: He'll ski you anytime, anywhere

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah!

title: ASSPEN
text: But this time, if he wins, you get your dad to not close our youth center

title: ASSPEN
text: What???

title: ASSPEN
text: Alright then, let's make it interesting. Tomorrow afternoon. On the K-13.

title: ASSPEN
text: The K-13? But that's the most dangerous run in all of America.

title: ASSPEN
text: Hell, I'm not chicken! Are you, Darsh?!

title: ASSPEN
text: I'll be there, you queen!

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh YEAH?!

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah!

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh, Darsh, you're even dumber than I thought! Again! See ya tomorrow.

title: ASSPEN
text: The Youth Center, outside. The boys exit the center

title: ASSPEN
text: Uh you're not really gonna go down that K-13 run, are ya, Stan?

title: ASSPEN
text: Dude, I have to!

title: ASSPEN
text: Stan, you can't let that Tad guy get to you. Scrwe him, dude.

title: ASSPEN
text: Dude, he's got Heather!

title: ASSPEN
text: You don't even know Heather!

title: ASSPEN
text: I know I know I-, ugh. Look I can't explain it but I have to do this. I'm not gonna die. I mean, how bad can the K-13 be?

title: ASSPEN
text: The K-13? You don't wanna go down that run. That run has got a historih. Thirty-five people have died goin' down it, and some say you can still see their ghosts up there. It was on that very ski run that a group of students were killed by a wolfboy who escaped from a mental institution. You see, that ski run was once a burial ground to a tribe of vampire wichicaw who ate the flesh of children with no eyes. Yah-, a lot of history on that ski run.

title: ASSPEN
text: ...Thank you.

title: ASSPEN
text: Yah.

title: ASSPEN
text: Look, Stan. When Kenny died I learned how important friends are. I'm not gonna lose another friend.

title: ASSPEN
text: This isn't about you, Kyle, I have to do this, okay? I have to!

title: ASSPEN
text: Aspen Heaven, next day. The parents are still meeting with Phil and Josh

title: ASSPEN
text: ...And so you see it's the investment opportunity that keeps on giving.

title: ASSPEN
text: How many times do we have to tell you this? We don't want to buy shares in a condo!

title: ASSPEN

text: Pressure us?! You kept us all day yesterday and then had a chair lift bring us back!

title: ASSPEN
text: Heh-ey, you can leave anytime you want. Of course, that is, if you don't want the super-secret fun prize for attending the slide show.

title: ASSPEN
text: No, we dont want the super-secret fun prize alright?! We just wanna ski!! Come on, everybody!!

title: ASSPEN
text: I know! Have you ever considered going in on a time share?

title: ASSPEN
text: That's only a couple thousand each, Josh!

title: ASSPEN
text: Don't listen to 'em, let's just go!

title: ASSPEN
text: Aspen Heaven, the hallway. The parents walk down the hall

title: ASSPEN
text: My God, can you believe those people?!

title: ASSPEN
text: I hope you don't blame me for all that. I mean, the ad ...did... just say a thirty-minute presentation.

title: ASSPEN
text: Let's just get out of here.

text: Aaagh!!

text: Oooo, you folks REALLY lucked out this time. You're visitor number one thousand!

title: ASSPEN
text: That means you can listen to our special offer for privileged members only!

title: ASSPEN
text: That does it! I'm calling the police!

text: Bunny slope, day. Beginners practice their moves. A girl stands next to Thumper; he sets her up and sends her on her way

text: Mr. Ski Instructor, I need a lot of training, fast. I'm gonna race down the K-13.

text: K-13? But you're just a beginner! You ski outta your league, you're gonna have a bad time.

title: ASSPEN
text: I have to do this, okay? I have to!

title: ASSPEN
text: Alright, well, if you gotta get good at somethin' really fast, there's only one way to do it. Come on!

text: Stan skis down a little faster, and Thumper shows him how much he's improved. Tad is then shown polishing his skills, landing after a ski jump and receiving Heather into his arms. The girl reads to Stan some more, but Stan's fallen asleep. She rouses him and resumes the lesson

title: ASSPEN
text: Aspen Heaven meeting room, day. Two officers are present with the two salesmen and the six parents

title: ASSPEN
text: Alll the ad said was that we had to attend a thirty-minute meeting, right, and, and it's been a day and a half! These guys won't let us leave!

title: ASSPEN
text: That's not true, officers, we said they could leave at any time.

title: ASSPEN
text: All right, let me see if I got this straight. You two gentlemen are offering part-time limited liability  ownership in one of your fabulous condos for the one-time price of eight thousand dollars?

title: ASSPEN
text: That's right!

title: ASSPEN
text: Sounds to me like if anybody should be arrested it should be YOU people for passin' up such a great deal!

text: Oh, Jesus.

text: No! Nooo!

text: The police work for time-share, too?

text: The police, the mayor, the president of the United States. Perhaps now you see the severity of your situation. I think we shall all sit down...  and listen to the presentation.

text: Sit!

text: Now, you're probably asking yourselves... "Can my time-share condo turn into a profit?"

text: K-13 peak. Tad and Stan are ready to ski

title: ASSPEN
text: This time you're not just goin gto lose, you're gonna die!

title: ASSPEN
text: Finish line area. The other boys and Ike are presnt, with their instructor behind them

title: ASSPEN
text: I can't lose another friend. First Kenny and now Stan? All I'm gonna have left are you two douches.

title: ASSPEN
text: Ready. Set. Go!

title: ASSPEN
text: Pizza... pizza... pizza...

title: ASSPEN
text: Tad's got the lead.

title: ASSPEN
text: Come on, Stan!

title: ASSPEN
text: Haha.  This shoud slow down Darsh a bit!

title: ASSPEN
text: And it looks like Tad is way out in front.

title: ASSPEN
text: Now I'll win for sure!

title: ASSPEN
text: Awgh, dude, I can't look.

title: ASSPEN
role: Let's see what some sand does to your speed, Darsh! [leaves.
text: Stan continues his run. Tad returns with more sand and pours it out]

title: ASSPEN
role: He doesn't stand a chance, now! [Stan reaches the fallen tree
text: and climbs over it, then continues his run. Tad pours out even more sand]

title: ASSPEN
role: I'm gonna beat 'im! [tosses the bucket away and leaves]

title: ASSPEN
text: The race is half over and Tad is still out in the lead!

title: ASSPEN
text: Huh, when Darsh skis by here, I'll let all these hamsters go. That should distract him just long enough for me to win the race!

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh Tad.

title: ASSPEN
text: ...What are you doing up here?

title: ASSPEN
text: Oh nothing. I just thought I could distract you. With these.

title: ASSPEN
text: Good job, dude!

title: ASSPEN
text: Thanks.

title: ASSPEN
text: You did it, Stan!

title: ASSPEN
text: Thanks a lot, Stan. Now we're gonna be able to keep the youth center.

title: ASSPEN
text: Well, that does it. Looks like the spirits of the Wakachaw Indians can finally rest in peace.

title: ASSPEN
text: Stan, I was wrong about you. Would you like to go out again?

title: ASSPEN
text: Go ahead, Stan. She's everything you ever wanted.

title: ASSPEN
text: There you are, boys!

title: ASSPEN
text: Mom, Dad!

title: ASSPEN
text: Where the hell have you guys been?!

title: ASSPEN
text: Uh we got a little held up at the time-share sales office.

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah, but the good news is we finally came to our senses and bought some shares in a condo. So we all get to come to Aspen for two weeks every year!

title: ASSPEN
text: Awwwwww!

title: ASSPEN
text: What's the matter? Didn't you boys like skiing?

title: ASSPEN
text: No! We can't keep track of when you pizza and when you French-fries and when the hot-shot asshole skier takes your girl or if you're supposed to race him the first time or train first to beat him on the really difficult mountain so you can save the dorky but hot girl's youth center. Skiing sucks!

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah, what a stupid sport!

title: ASSPEN
text: I heard that you were the one responsible for making Tad lose the race. Thanks.

title: ASSPEN
text: Yeah. Well he really flipped when he saw these.

title: ASSPEN
text: Quaid...

title: ASSPEN
text: Start the reactor...
